transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir. Sir, ye do jo category maine aapko batai hai na, wo dono category hamari D rank mein add ho gayi hai, thik hai sir? To jaise abhi WhatsApp calling hum kar rahe the na, thoda sa net ka dikkat aa raha tha, to usme video call pe dikha nahi pa raha tha waha pe. To waha se aap mobile ke through na ye dono category jaise hi hategi, MDF mein deal nahi karna chahte hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Decorative tray to rahega na sir?
Customer: Decorative tray to usme to sari tray aa jati hai. Jyada decoration [inaudible] [unintelligible] hui hai, thik hai sir. Main kya karunga decorative tray ko main ek assign kar de raha hu aapke product mein, thik hai? Aur jo MDF wala hai, usko hum kal ek bar fir se connect ho jayenge WhatsApp WhatsApp calling ke through, thik hai sir? To jaise abhi network ka bahut problem aa raha hai, to wo hum MDF wala bhi hata denge, clear ho gaya?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ya jo maine aapko step by step bataya tha na sir, waha pe jaake by lead preference mein jaake waha se aap hata sakte hai. To wo actually network ke chalte nahi stable nahi hai. To ye cheez hai. Aur sir aapke paas hota hai na subah.
Customer: Haan wo subah hota hai na subah.
Executive: Haan, main samajh gaya aapki baat ko. Aur sir aapne na customer care pe call kiya hua tha, to wo ek feedback mere liye aayega, thik hai sir? To aapke paas mera bhi number hai, to aap ek bar kal mere se WhatsApp calling ke through jaise bhi hai, to ya Google Meet ke through ek bar connect karke ye jo problem aa rahi hai na MDF wali aur jo decorative wali, decorative wali to main abhi assign kar de raha hu. MDF wali jo hai, wo aapko waha se hatani padegi D rank, tabhi wo hamare paas MDF ki nahi aayengi. Aur jaise aapne bataya do, do abhi hamara conversion hua sample wala, to ₹2500 ke kareeban ka hai, lekin sir wo wala hum mere ko bhi lagta hai ki wo dono final ho jayega. Aur ye jo hai jinse baat hua tha aapka, to wo kal connect kar lenge Sunday ko, wo shadi mein busy thi, to ek bar kal Sunday ko. Ye direct client tha unka naam [unintelligible] tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ye client basically kya hai ye directly aapko connect kiya hua hai, thik hai? Matlab isme buylead ke through nahi aaya, aapke catalog ke through aaya. Kyuki all over India mein ab aapka catalog na sab teesre number pe dikh raha hai aur aapke jo aapka location hai Sambhal, waha pe to aapka pehle number pe aa raha hai. Category wise. Aap dekhiyega sir, matlab 110, 115, 119 ki matlab per mahine aapka.
Customer: Yaha jo yaha jo yaha jo Sambhal mein clients chala rahe hai.
Executive: Unse upar aa raha hai sir, unse upar aa raha hai. Kitne log chala rahe hai? Lagbhag kitne log hai?
Customer: Lagbhag kitne log hai sir?
Executive: Dekho sir Sambhal mein agar main baat karu na, overall yaha pe hamare all over India mein to 12000 client aa rahe hai, thik hai sir? Jo hamara decorative tray mein deal karta hai. Haan haan. Sambhal mein jo client base hai, haan haan, jo Sambhal mein hamare paas client hai TrustSeal ka jo client base aata hai sir, wo kareeban kareeban 112 client ke kareeban aa raha hai, thik hai sir? Aur jo MDC aur TrustSeal aur higher services ko mila dete hai, to 250 se kareeban aa raha hai sir Sambhal mein. Kuch usme
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Exporter hai, kuch importer hai, ye cheez hai na. To aap Google pe just last time maine jaise aapko dikhaya tha na, Google ke through aap apna product line likhe to Sambhal mein aap check out karenge. [unintelligible] maine aapko.
Customer: Haan. Bahar ki list aati hai usme zyada tar.
Executive: Haan dekho foreign ki buylead is package mein nahi hota hai sir. Foreign ka buylead is package. Uska kitne ka package lena padega?
Executive: Sir wo uska rehta hai, ye to package aapka chalega hi, thik hai sir? Export ka jo package rehta hai, ek haan ek wo alag. Export paise deke nahi nahi nahi nahi sir wo export ka package alag hota hai sir import. Ye Indian package hai wo export ka package hai uska jo costing aati hai ek saal ka ₹120000 plus GST ka aata hai. Usme aapko per month sorry per week 10 buylead milti hai sir IndiaMART ki taraf se.
Customer: Roz roz 10 buylead?
Executive: Haan roz nahi, ek ek hafte mein aap 10 buylead consume kar sakte hai. Per month. Jaise yaha pe aapko haan wo aap 10 buylead koi bhi foreign ki consume kar sakte hai. Clear hua?
Executive: Aapko waha pe jab aap export package lete hai to direct call aur direct enquiry aapki badh jati hai. Ye benefit hai.
Executive: Lekin abhi sir TrustSeal ko abhi dekho main export abhi nahi kahunga aapko, clear ho gaya? Kyuki itna jaldi jaldi hum conversion haan conversion itna nahi. Jab tak isme aapka ek output aa jata hai, thik hai sir? Teen char, char client hai kareeban do ka sample hai aur do ka abhi baat chal rahi hai aur ek client aur hai jo kal aapse baat karega. To wo directly uska chances hai ki kareeban kareeban wo deal aapse hi kar lega. Kyuki aapke main ab ab aap catalog aap dekhiye sir kaisa aapka dikh raha hai. Pehle aap catalog jab dekh rahe the jab aapne aapka MDC ka tha, us samay ka catalog aur abhi ka catalog aap dekhenge to dono mein bahut antar hai. Bahut bahut antar hai. Aapne check kiya hai sir kuch laga matlab aisa jab aap aap jab basic services mein chala rahe the us us usse aur abhi mein aapka bahut antar hai, bahut antar bhi hai. Dusri cheez hai ki number of queries aur number of call aur number of client jo aapko approach kar raha hai wo matlab aisa nahi hai ki keh raha hai ki nahi maine keval apne client aa raha hai, baat kar raha hai aur aapse deal on bhi kar raha hai, sample bhi mang raha hai, aisa nahi hai ki kahin fas raha hai. Tabhi maine aapko kaha tha sir is sab cheezon ka effect padta hai jo aapne meri baat mani aur ye sab cheezein. Ab ye hai ki sir ye wala agar ye 65 jo pieces mang raha hai iska kitna order hoga kareeban kitne ka ho jayega? 15-20000 ka to hoga.
Customer: 60. Haan haan itne ka hi hoga.
Executive: Itna aur jo dusra wala tha sir jo ek aur jo ek 1500 wala order diya jo 1000 wala order diya wo sample wala wo kitne ka padega?
Customer: Wo to 300 tray bata rahi hai shayad. Magar is order mein wo sample mein der ho gayi.
Executive: 10-15 din late ho gaya wo sample.
Customer: Achha late ho gaya. Nahi waise kitne ka pad jata tha matlab 15 aur ye kareeban 15 aur maan lo iska bhi.
Customer: Tray ka 20 30 20 35 20 se 30000 ka lagbhag sara.
Executive: 20 35. Achha 300 tray bata rahi hai shayad 300 tray agar bata rahi hai kareeban kareeban 50000 ke kareeban ka aur do teen client aur hai. Thik hai sir ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chalo sir.
Executive: Hai na? Isko main ek bar decorative wale ko laga deta hu MDF wale ke liye ek bar kal fir connect ho jayenge, thik hai WhatsApp ke through. Thoda sa network ka sir agar ho sake to wifi ya kuch aise vyavastha kar lijiye jaise ki.
Customer: Wifi nahi hai subah ko hum kar lenge isko.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai chalega. Sir ek main concern aapka close karunga, wo ek feedback mere liye aayega aapki personal email ID pe ye 187 wale pe to usse please kar dijiyega, thik hai? Mere liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove MDF category from D rank.

- Network issues during WhatsApp calling.

- Enquiring about export package details.



Resolution:

- Decorative tray assigned to the product.

- Agreed to connect via WhatsApp to remove MDF.

- Provided details of export package.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect with customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- category, mdf, decorative tray, export, trustseal
